title: World Christmas Market Returning to Singapore
blurb: Everything to expect at the Christmas Market in 2025.
description: The World Christmas Market is returning to Singapore in 2025, promising a festive and immersive experience. This event typically features a variety of stalls offering Christmas-themed goods, food, and beverages. Attendees can expect to find unique gifts, decorations, and seasonal treats. The market often includes entertainment such as live music, performances, and activities for children, creating a family-friendly atmosphere. It's a great place to soak in the holiday spirit and enjoy the festive season with loved ones. The market aims to bring the charm and traditions of European Christmas markets to Singapore.
keyword_tag: Christmas market, festive events, family activities, Singapore

title: World Christmas Market at Bayfront Event Space
blurb: A Christmas celebration across nine festive zones.
description: The World Christmas Market in Singapore returns as ‘Togetherland’, transforming the Bayfront Event Space into ‘A Christmas Constellation’. The 25-day festival promises new attractions and interactive experiences, unfolding across nine zones inspired by Santa’s reindeer. Dancer’s Magical Playground features a Christmas Musical and live performances. Dasher’s Festive Feast offers themed bites and cocktails. Prancer’s Star Bazaar brings together local makers. Other zones include Comet’s Global Market, Donner’s Heartlight Haven, and Candy Cane Lane with photo ops and whimsical backdrops. The event focuses on joy, generosity, and the shared spirit of Christmas.
datetime_display: December 11, 2025–January 4, 2026 : 5 pm to 11 pm (Monday to Thursday); 4 pm to 11 pm (Friday to Sunday) December 25 & 31 : 4 pm to 2 am
keyword_tag: Christmas market, festive events, family activities, shopping, dining

title: World Christmas Market 2025 in Singapore
blurb: The 2025 edition will be twice as big!
description: The World Christmas Market festival unfolds across nine zones, each inspired by one of Santa’s reindeer and imagined as part of the Christmas constellation. Dancer’s Magical Playground will serve as the main arena, featuring a specially commissioned Christmas Musical and a packed lineup of live performances beneath twinkling lights. Dasher’s Festive Feast will tempt visitors with themed bites and cocktails, while Prancer’s Star Bazaar brings together local makers, craftspeople, and social enterprises for a unique shopping experience. The event aims to connect people through joy, generosity, and the shared spirit of Christmas, offering a deeper cultural storytelling experience.
keyword_tag: Christmas market, family activities, live performances, shopping

title: World Christmas Market 2025 at Bayfront Event Space
blurb: Festive zones, treats, and fun for the whole family.
description: Explore Comet’s Global Market with cheeses, wines, chocolates, and baked treats. Five festive zones hosted by Donner, Vixen, Blitzen, Cupid, and Rudolph are dedicated to sustainability, charity, family fun, and pets. Enjoy photo ops at Candy Cane Lane with glowing candy canes and real Christmas trees. Donner’s Heartlight Haven focuses on social and sustainability efforts, inviting visitors to connect with partner charities and social enterprises. A family-friendly event with activities and attractions for all ages, promoting kindness and festive cheer.
datetime_display: December 11, 2025–January 4, 2026 : 5 pm to 11 pm (Monday to Thursday); 4 pm to 11 pm (Friday to Sunday) December 25 & 31 : 4 pm to 2 am
keyword_tag: Christmas market, family fun, festive activities, charity, sustainability
